fightsoul.name: BEAR
fightsoul.description: When our side or the enemy side dies, it will rage. When attacking will restore Rage.

fightsoul.name: BEAR
fightsoul.description: When entering the battle, it will recover a large amount of Rage. When attacked, will restore Rage.

fightsoul.name: TURTLE
fightsoul.description: When attacked, will restore Rage. When attacking will restore Rage.
